item.title: MATRIX SERVICE CO 10-K
item.description: MATRIX SERVICE CO, which is in the Construction Special Trade Contractors [1700] industry, SEC 10-K filing on October 11, 2022 had 27490 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 291 instances fiscal - 253 instances 30 - 248 instances financial - 240 instances june - 238 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
